Title: Silverlight Color Wheel
Description: The Silverlight Color Wheel is a simple component built in Silverlight to allow the user to select colors. These colors are available for use in your application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Silverlight Color Wheel is a simple component built in Silverlight to allow the user to select colors. These colors are available for use in your application.

This Silverlight color wheel, when complete, will be a silverlight control with the following abilities:
  • Can be skinned
  • Can store multiple colors
  • Throws event on selection
